descriptionHtml:
This is a RaceMenu Preset of my freshly baked Orc, called Grinteeth.
Wanted to share it in case there is someone out there who likes this kind of looks.

[b]Mods I use for him:
[/b]
Body: [url=https://www.loverslab.com/files/file/498-sos-schlongs-of-skyrim/]SoS [/url] with [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26145]Smooth Body Textures for Better Males and SoS[/url]
Face: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27815]Fine Face Textures for Men[/url]

Hair: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311]KS Hairdo's - Renewal[/url] 
Brows: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411]Brows[/url]
Eyes: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/88506?]Elegant Beauty Stunning Eyes Remastered[/url]﻿


[b]Armors I used for the screenshots:[/b]

Skimpy Orcish Armor (VectorPlexus)
Light Daedric Armor for Men (RefurbMadness)

Follower version is now available (separate mod), but has minor mouth clipping while talking animations, which I couldn't fix completely.


Hope you like him! :)
author: Thrwomp
